text:
Everything I know about the Kentucky Derby I learned from reading Hunter S. Thompson's fucking bonkers account of his experience at the sporting event in the '70s. You guys ever read that shit about his standard day-to-day drug regimen? The man was a self-medicating machine. If you want to make drugs less appealing, why on earth would you continue to green-light endlessly entertaining pieces of narrative non-fiction in which the writer's prolific drug intake is basically its own character within the story?

Well, it's Derby season, baby. Dress the part and you, too, can look like the type of guy that could conceivably invent an entirely new style of writing while on enough drugs to sedate an elephant. Let's get weird.
